alert.note: Alert for Bay (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bay County through 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Auburn, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Auburn around 520 PM EDT. Kawkawlin and Linwood around 535 PM EDT. Bay City and Essexville around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Crump, Willard and Bay City State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
